original_text: In that deep place, people will look at you carefully. They will be very surprised. They will think, “This is the man who caused the earth to shake. He caused kingdoms to shake with fear. Is that really true? In that deep place, people will look at you carefully. They will be very surprised. They will think, “This is the man who caused the earth to shake. He caused kingdoms to shake with fear. Is that really true? In that deep place, people will look at you carefully. They will be very surprised. They will think, “This is the man who caused the earth to shake. He caused kingdoms to shake with fear. Is that really true?
korean_text: 너를 보는 이가 주목하여 너를 자세히 살펴 보며 말하기를 이 사람이 땅을 진동시키며 열국을 놀라게 하며

sentences.original_text: In that deep place, people will look at you carefully.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 깊은 곳에서, 사람들이 너를 주의 깊게 볼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: This is the man who caused the earth to shake.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 땅을 흔들게 한 자다.

sentences.original_text: He caused kingdoms to shake with fear.
